mention.text: News Online Today Gas Industry Challenged 2012/02/21 Kronos ' oil and gas industry has warned it

`` Kronos ' fields contain an abundance of oil and gas yet to be found and it is critical we find the means to turn the current state of exploration around '' - Energy Minister Jules Jecovic The annual activity survey by Oil and Gas Kronos
the rapid decline in oil and gas production from Kronos fields in recent years
